title: Dream Family
description: "Why is this so hard for me? Why am I having so much trouble? Why do I feel so helpless, so hopeless? What the hell is wrong with me?"After tangling with murders and mobsters, not to mention medical school and three years of residency, Sara thought she could handle anything. And then the police show up without warning at her new office and arrest her for a crime she can't possibly have committed. Sara's confidence, and her grip on reality, is shattered during one terrifying night in jail.Now, the very dreams that have endangered her life and driven her to the edge of madness may be the only thing that can help Sara find herself again..."Dream Family" is the powerful fourth novel in the "Dreams" series.
author: J.J. DiBenedetto
